hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
PATH=/usr/local/rvm/bin:/usr/bin:$PATH set +e cd ${JENKINS_HOME}/tools rvmsudo rvm 2.2.0 do ruby check_pull_requests.rb denebola ret=$? set -e if [ $ret -eq 1 ] ; then exit 1 elif [ $ret -eq 2 ] ; then echo 'Pull request already created' exit 0 fi
cd ${WORKSPACE} git checkout develop git reset HEAD . git checkout . git pull origin develop git branch -D update-gem || true git checkout -b update-gem rvm 2.2.0 do bundle install --path=vendor/bundle rvm 2.2.0 do bundle update git status -s | grep 'Gemfile.lock' if [ $? -eq 1 ] ; then echo 'No gems to update' exit 0 fi git add Gemfile.lock git commit -m 'update Gemfile.lock' cd ${JENKINS_HOME}/tools rvmsudo rvm 2.2.0 do ruby update_changelog.rb ${WORKSPACE}/CHANGELOG.md cd ${WORKSPACE} git add CHANGELOG.md git commit -m 'update CHANGELOG.md' git push origin :update-gem || true git push origin update-gem cd ${JENKINS_HOME}/tools rvmsudo rvm 2.2.0 do ruby create_pull_request.rb denebola develop
